神作，放在几十年后仍不过时，4k分辨率加高特效下画面精良，谁能想到光圈科技和黑山基地是竞争对手呢？Valve旗下两大游戏IP就这样被串联了起来。Valve在游戏制作上毋庸置疑是世界第一梯队。

good

Quite literally some of the funniest dialogue and character lines I've ever had the pleasure of experiencing in a video game.  JK Simmons and Stephen Merchant as new characters and shine alongside Ellen McClain as GLaDOS.  

It's a fun game, too, but the best part is the characters and their story, without a doubt.
Stephen Marchant is brilliant.  Very funny game thanks to him.

A masterpiece with a compelling campaign that is, without a doubt, one of the best storylines I've ever played through in any game (I've already played through the solo campaign twice and it's still an amazing experience). The co-op mode is an added bonus and is very fun to play with a friend. I would highly recommend this game!

GOOD GAME

Необычная игра, моментами сложные, но не менее интересные головоломки. Добавилось куча новых механизмов в отличии от первой части.
Игра представляет из себя ряд различных изолированных друг от друга камер с заданиями (игра проходит как в замкнутых так и в открытых комнатах). Цель - пройти к выходу. Камеры/комнаты имеют определенный ландшафт, различные хитроумные механизмы, лазерные лучи, поверхности для подпрыгивания, ускорения, гели и т. д. Имеются различные ловушки, опасность гравитации и роботы-охранники. Не плохая тренировка мышления.) А также в эту игру можно играть вдвоём!!! Игра стоит своих денег. Я осталась довольной и Вам советую окунутся в эту атмосферу.)

Now the first portal was good and all, but this is amazing. The puzzles are even more fun and satisfying than the first game, characters like wheatley, cave johnson (glados in this game as well), are great, and the environments (especially area of aperture underground where wheatley sends you) look great. The wheatley boss is also really fun. I regret not playing this game sooner.

This is one of the best games of all time. It has innovative puzzles and storytelling and it has great game mechanics.

Perhaps the best game I ever had played. And I just played around 50% of it. It's so well done, so juicy to play, and so smart puzzles. I don't think this game needs a part 3. If this doesn't desapoint me (what I'm sure it won't) the end will close the history perfectly well.

My God this game was was great, I just beat the game as of writing this review and after I'm done writing this I'll go play it again. This game was f**king great, you want story? You got it. You want puzzles that don't melt your mind? You got it. Valve outdid themselves Portal and then One-Up'ed themselves with it's sequel. PLEASE if you have a Steam account, there is not justifiable reason why you don't own a copy of Portal 1 and 2, and Half-Life 1 and 2, so stop reading this review  AND HIT THAT BUY BUTTON!!!!!!!
